text: Anzalopoi ɠilagilagi pɛ ge ɠɛni kɛɛzu ga kona gila, é ʋa li masagi Zɛɛlesɛse ʋɔ bɛ, eɠɛʋelei anzanuiti ta-vaazeikpasui ɠɛni la. Mazɔlɔɔ ma nu ɠɛni alu dɔzita mɔungi ɠɛɛzu, é ɗa miile gulɔi ziɛ ɓɔɠɔ ma, alu dɔzitai mɔtai é naa ɠɛ, é ɗa gulɔ maku nɛɛnɛgiti ta anzaiti ta-ʋa gulɔi zɔiti siɛ ɓɔɠɔ ma.
